title: Issue 344
summary: All About SVGs and Apps built with MAUI!

items.description:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #344 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities this week.

Some great design articles this week as well as more articles about apps built with MAUI. The future is looking bright.

Have a great week everyone

♥️

Kym
items.description_markdown:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #344 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around  Xamarin and MAUI communities this week.

Some great design articles this week as well as more articles about apps built with MAUI. The future is looking bright.

Have a great week everyone

♥️

Kym

items.title: SVG Generators
items.description:
A complete guide to SVG generators: everything from SVG shapes and cropping tools to SVG filters, color matrix mixers and SVG to JSX generators. Given how easy it is to work with SVGs in MAUI this could be a useful resource.

SVG Generators by Iris Lješnjanin
items.description_markdown:
A complete guide to SVG generators: everything from SVG shapes and cropping tools to SVG filters, color matrix mixers and SVG to JSX generators. Given how easy it is to work with SVGs in MAUI this could be a useful resource.

[**SVG Generators**](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2021/03/svg-generators/) by [Iris Lješnjanin](https://twitter.com/smash_it_on)

items.title: Every Screen in Your App Should Be a Scrolling View
items.description:
This is not technically a Xamarin article, but it is a good discussion of design decisions in your UI hierarchy especially in regard to creating responsive UIs.

items.description_markdown:

items.title: How to Add an Alert Notification UI to Your .NET MAUI App
items.description:
This blog covers the use case scenarios for the alert notification UI and how to add it to your app using the Syncfusion .NET MAUI Badge View control.

items.description_markdown:

items.title: Merge Conflict: 298: The Great M1 Conspiracy
items.description:
Frank has a grand conspiracy theory when it comes to what is going on with the M1 Ultra and M2. We discuss why they glued two chips together.

items.title: Multi-Language Apps with .NET MAUI Blazor Localization
items.description:
Localization is a great way to let your app reach a broader audience and be more inclusive! In this video we will learn how to add localization to your .NET MAUI Blazor app with Microsoft.Extensions.Localization. With the help of the IStringLocalizer and resx files we will see how to add translations for different languages to our app in minutes!

Multi-Language Apps with .NET MAUI Blazor Localization by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
Localization is a great way to let your app reach a broader audience and be more inclusive! In this video we will learn how to add localization to your .NET MAUI Blazor app with Microsoft.Extensions.Localization. With the help of the IStringLocalizer and resx files we will see how to add translations for different languages to our app in minutes!

[**Multi-Language Apps with .NET MAUI Blazor Localization**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EHoO9hG-Uzo) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)
